channel.title: [CONFIG] [718] Point to Sidebar icon/orb config
channel.description:
Was trying to find some new configs. Found this cool hell of a config.
[img]http://puu.sh/aO7Wd/60203461e3.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aO7ZV/62b6f6b6a6.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aO896/79ed9c7ea4.png[/img]
[code] sendConfig(1021, SIDE_BAR_ICON); [/code]
Since I'm a nice guy, here's all the values you can set this to: [code] 1 - Combat icon 2 - Task icon 3 - Stats icon 4 - Quests icon 5 - Inventory icon 6 - Equipment icon 7 - Prayer icon 8 - Spells icon 9 - Summoning icon 10 - Friends icon 11 - Friends chat icon 12 - Clan chat icon 13 - Settings icon 14 - Emotes icon 15 - Music icon 16 - Notes icon 17 - Run orb 18 - Clears all of them 19 - World map 20 - Compass [/code]
[b]Note:[/b] Value 0 - 16 can be used with values 17 - 20. here's an example of such: [img]http://puu.sh/aO8QM/8baee8c094.png[/img] [code] sendConfig(1021, 4); sendConfig(1021, 17); [/code]
- Arham

item.title: [CONFIG] [718] Point to Sidebar icon/orb config
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Was trying to find some new configs. Found this cool hell of a config.



sendConfig(1021, SIDE_BAR_ICON);

Since I’m a nice guy, here’s all the values you can set this to:

1 - Combat icon
2 - Task icon
3 - Stats icon
4 - Quests icon
5 - Inventory icon
6 - Equipment icon
7 - Prayer icon
8 - Spells icon
9 - Summoning icon 
10 - Friends icon
11 - Friends chat icon
12 - Clan chat icon
13 - Settings icon
14 - Emotes icon
15 - Music icon
16 - Notes icon
17 - Run orb
18 - Clears all of them
19 - World map
20 - Compass

Note: Value 0 - 16 can be used with values 17 - 20. here’s an example of such:

sendConfig(1021, 4);
sendConfig(1021, 17);
  • Arham

Read full topic
